content.raw:
It changed late last week.  Minor differences, but I suggest you try it again to make sure you are using the latest image.  
  
BTW, I suggest running the `docker images` to the get the existing **IMAGE ID**, and then remove it `docker rmi -f [`**IMAGE ID**`]`before installing the latest one.  Just to be safe.
content.html:
It changed late last week. Minor differences, but I suggest you try it again to make sure you are using the latest image.

BTW, I suggest running the docker images to the get the existing IMAGE ID, and then remove it docker rmi -f [IMAGE ID]before installing the latest one. Just to be safe.
